label: 用聞, 用達
本: Osaka: The Merchants' Capital of Early Modern Japan . Cornell University Press . 1999
著者: McClain, James L.  and Wakita Osamu
見出し読み: ようきき, ようたし
見出し読み_mod: ようきき, ようたし
説明文: Merchant delegate; helped to collect taxes, disseminate laws, mediate disputes, and conduct other government business on behalf of the Osaka city magistrates, rural intendants, and other proprietors in the Osaka region.
